backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition placeholder for backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to update a specific image in CustomCarpetsCtaSection for full-width cover behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including styles, config, sections, and layout components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the site to IC mainnet, including required static assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with extensive OKLCH color variables and dark mode definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, favicon, font preconnects, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling the site sections with a disabled Collections feature flag.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty placeholder file for the site footer component.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with scroll detection, smooth-scroll navigation, mobile menu, and branded logo.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section listing four capabilities using icon cards with centered layout and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section displaying four benefit cards with icons and responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Collections display component selecting thumbnails via useMemo and rendering collection cards with images and tags.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with phone, email, location links, WhatsApp CTA, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/CustomC: Displays a custom carpets CTA with an image, capabilities list, and WhatsApp project-start button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Shows a filterable gallery with modal viewer, error handling, and precomputed asset URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, intro text, scroll-to-gallery button, and WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines contact details and provides a helper to build encoded WhatsApp URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, theming, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds a base-aware, encoded URL for assets by cleaning and encoding path segments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature records, and a pending request for full-bleed CTA image behavior.
